thread.title: Is Trump drawing up an even stricter migration crackdown? | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Is Trump drawing up an even stricter migration crackdown? | Daily Mail Online

author: Nikki Schwab
title: Is Trump drawing up an even stricter migration crackdown? | Daily Mail Online
text: Is Trump drawing up an even stricter migration crackdown? Draft executive order touts deportation for receiving benefits and crackdown on work visas Two draft executive orders were leaked to the Washington Post and bar more types of immigration One order aims to reduce burdens on the American taxpayer by rooting out immigrants who might need public assistance - and deporting them The other prioritizes American workers by only allowing work visas in the 'national interest' It also orders the Department of Homeland Security and the State Department to author a report on how they plan to curb the ''birth tourism phenomenon' Trump railed against so-called 'anchor babies' last August, suggesting they shouldn't be citizens, in controversial comments he made to Bill O'Reilly The White House has yet to comment on the authenticity of the documents, which are floating around the federal workforce Published: 00:00 GMT, 2 February 2017 | Updated: 06:23 GMT, 2 February 2017 123 shares
